import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' const RingSettings = ( {userRingSettings} ) => { const [ringOne, setRingOne] = useState('A') const [ringTwo, setRingTwo] = useState('A') const [ringThree, setRingThree] = useState('A') useEffect(() => { console.log("ringSetting one: ", ringOne) console.log("ringSetting Two: ", ringTwo) console.log("ringSetting Three: ", ringThree) }, [ringOne, ringTwo, ringThree]) return (
) } export default RingSettings
